creator: WAUG Travel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
GooglePlay Featured APP :
· WAUG is a GooglePlay Featured App offering everything from transit, main attractions & theme-park tickets, WiFi, SIM Cards, tours, to restaurants. WAUG is your trustworthy travel buddy.

You can easily book more than 20,000 unique activities in 200 different destinations around the world. Book unforgettable moments with WAUG.

Explore MORE :
· You can discover more of the world with WAUG. The app allows you to meet a variety of activities in just a few taps at discounted prices.

Add a little magic to your trip with products like tickets to the theme parks around the world, Skip-The-Line tickets for various attractions in Europe, transit passes in Japan, world-famous aquariums, parasailing in Cebu, thrilling skydives, and many more.

You can now experience the world in a different way through WAUG and make unforgettable moments. Our team is always striving to support all of our users to have a rich and fulfilling travel experience.

Why you need WAUG :
· Up to 60% DISCOUNT and SPECIAL DEALS
· Over 20,000 SPECIAL ACTIVITIES
· HAND-PICKED ACTIVITIEScurated by WAUG Travel
· EASY-TO-USE mobile voucher
· CONVENIENT usability with QR codes/Bar codes

Best ways to use :
· View from over 20,000 different activities in advance and plan ahead.
· Purchase to your taste with up to 60% discount.
· Get additional discounts with promo coupons.
· Find your favorite activities by searching for popular activities and keywords.
· See and enjoy the activities around you on the map.
· Discover activities in your area according to your current location on the main page.

WAUG Magazine - More than just a guidebook :
· You can find all the best attractions, hidden gems, top hotels by destination, and even shopping tips on the WAUG Magazine. You won’t need travel guidebooks anymore.

MEET WAUG :
Meet WAUG anywhere in the world
· https://m.waug.com
· https://www.waug.com
· Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/waugglobal/

OUR MISSION :
Our goal is to provide a new and unforgettable travel experience for each traveler.
Enjoy the experience of fast and easy travel booking through WAUG.

Need Assistance? :
· E-mail : help@waug.com
· Phone : 070 - 4353 - 5959
· KakaoTalk : @waug

Authorization Request Information :
· READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Used for user's profile photo and media uploads on reviews
· WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Used for user's profile photo and media uploads on reviews

· ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION : Used to search for nearby activities
· ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION : Used to search for nearby activities

Device Authorization:
The Android operating system uses an authorization system to access specific features or data on the app. The first time there is a need for the following authorizations for the app, you will be notified to grant permission.

To help you understand the authorizations used by WAUG app, we will explain the main reasons why each authorization is requested. The following authorizations are all optional. In other words, certain features may not be accessible if you have disagreed to giving permission, but the WAUG app itself is still available.

Access to photos, media, and files on your device : Used for your profile photo and posting photos on reviews
Access to location : Used to search for nearby activities

Please note: This function is only available in Android 6.0 and later. If your Android version is before 6.0, you need to update the software to configure app authorizations. You can edit your existing authorizations in device settings after updating your software.

title: WAUG - No.1 Accommodations & Activities

container.value: 20F, DMC DigitalCube Bldg, 34 Sangamsan-ro, Mapo-gu, Seoul, South Korea

creator: WAUG Travel Inc.
descriptionHtml:
GooglePlay Featured APP :
WAUG, selected as Google Play recommended App allows you to make reservations with the the lowest rates on hotels, activities, admission tickets, restaurants and even on spa reservations.
Make your trip magical by making your reservation on WAUG.

Explore MORE :
Through WAUG, you are able to explore and discover the world. With just a few taps your reservation is complete and don't forget with the lowest rates.
Compare 3 million hotels worldwide and make your reservation with the lowest rate. Get your special offer on admission tickets to theme parks, hotel restaurants and on spa reservations.
Wherever you travel to, WAUG provides pick up services and car rental services with the most satisfying price.
Team WAUG is working hard to support all our customers travel experiences rich and with unforgettable memories.

Why you need WAUG :
· COMPARE and make reservations with lowest rates on hotels worldwide
· Up to 60% DISCOUNT and SPECIAL DEALS
· Over 20,000 SPECIAL ACTIVITIES
· HAND-PICKED ACTIVITIEScurated by WAUG Travel
· EASY-TO-USE mobile voucher
· CONVENIENT usability with QR codes/Bar codes

WAUG Magazine - More than just a guidebook :
· You can find all the best attractions, hidden gems, top hotels by destination, and even shopping tips on the WAUG Magazine. You won’t need travel guidebooks anymore.

MEET WAUG :
Meet WAUG anywhere in the world
· https://m.waug.com
· https://www.waug.com
· Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/waugglobal/

OUR MISSION :
Our goal is to provide a new and unforgettable travel experience for each traveler.
Enjoy the experience of fast and easy travel booking through WAUG.

Need Assistance? :
· E-mail : lhj@waug.com
· Phone : 070 - 4353 - 5959
· KakaoTalk : @waug

Authorization Request Information :
The Android operating system uses an authorization system to access specific features or data on the app. The first time there is a need for the following authorizations for the app, you will be notified to grant permission.
To help you understand the authorizations used by WAUG app, we will explain the main reasons why each authorization is requested. The following authorizations are all optional. In other words, certain features may not be accessible if you have disagreed to giving permission, but the WAUG app itself is still available.
· READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Used for user's profile photo and media uploads on reviews
· WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Used for user's profile photo and media uploads on reviews
· ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION : Used to search for nearby activities
· ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION : Used to search for nearby activities

Please note: This function is only available in Android 6.0 and later. If your Android version is before 6.0, you need to update the software to configure app authorizations. You can edit your existing authorizations in device settings after updating your software.

descriptionHtml:
Where should I go? What can I do? Your search for all things travel starts here.

GooglePlay Featured APP :

Explore More. :
Discover over 100,000+ activities in 210 destinations with WAUG.
Book admission tickets and tours, as well as restaurants, spas, and unique expriences, at a discount.

Where Are U Going :
WAUG, short for "Where Are U Going?", is the best companion for travelers. From planning a trip to booking last-minute tickets, you can do everything in one app!

Why use WAUG?:
· Discover things-to-do and places-to-see for your next trip
· Reserve tickets and tours at a cheaper price — up to 60% off!
· Find unique experiences and hidden gems
· Select from a variety of day tours
· Know more about travel spots (WAUG Magazine & WAUG Blog)

Easy booking and redemption :
Book with just a few clicks and enter popular tourist attractions without waiting!

Other features you'll love :
· Dine in at hotel restaurants and local gourmet spots at a cheaper price
· Find spas and aesthetic shops offering various treatments
· Check airport transfers at a glance
· Book a WAUG Originals tour, our branded tour designed by us!
· View special experiences and classes

creator: WAUG Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Hello!
Wondering "What to do at my travel destination?" Those worries end now!
With WAUG, you can check out everything you can enjoy at any travel destination worldwide and book it most conveniently.

GooglePlay Featured APP :
WAUG, selected as Google Play recommended App allows you to make reservations with the the lowest rates on hotels, activities, admission tickets, restaurants and even on spa reservations.
Make your trip magical by making your reservation on WAUG.

Where Are U Going :
WAUG is named after the initials of "Where Are U Going". Just like its name, you can book all kinds of exciting activities wherever you go.

EXPLORE MORE. :
WAUG allows you to book over 100,000 activities in travel destinations all over the world. You can find tickets to major attractions, unforgettable tours & activities you won't find anywhere else, and even make discounted restaurant reservations.
We also offer spa & massage reservations and tickets to global professional sports events like the Premier League, NBA, and Major League Baseball. So, explore the exciting things happening around the world with WAUG right now!

Needed when :
· If you want to check out what's available to do at your travel destination!
· If you want to buy tickets to popular travel attractions at a discounted price!
· If you want to have a more special, unforgettable travel experience!
· If you want to know various information about the travel destination!

Convenient and Simple :
Enter popular travel attractions without waiting in line with Fast Track entry, and booking is easy with just a few taps! And direct entry with QR tickets! Everything is very simple.

Introduction to Popular Categories :
· Discounted tickets to all travel destinations worldwide!
· Unforgettable special tours & activities
· Airport pickup services all over the world
· Discounts from Michelin Guide restaurants to hotel buffets!
· From hotel spas to local massages
· Premier League, NBA, MLB sports ticket discounts!
· WAUG ONLY - WAUG 'Originals' Tours

Authorization Request Information :
The Android operating system uses an authorization system to access specific features or data on the app. The first time there is a need for the following authorizations for the app, you will be notified to grant permission.
To help you understand the authorizations used by WAUG app, we will explain the main reasons why each authorization is requested. The following authorizations are all optional. In other words, certain features may not be accessible if you have disagreed to giving permission, but the WAUG app itself is still available.
· READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Used for user's profile photo and media uploads on reviews
· WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : Used for user's profile photo and media uploads on reviews
· ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION : Used to search for nearby activities
· ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION : Used to search for nearby activities

Please note: This function is only available in Android 6.0 and later. If your Android version is before 6.0, you need to update the software to configure app authorizations. You can edit your existing authorizations in device settings after updating your software.
